description: This file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for creating, updating, and responding with note data in the NotesBackend project.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new note, requiring Title and Content.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing note, requiring Title and Content.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO for responding with note details which include Id, Title, Content, and timestamps.
